name: How's life
description:
Disclaimer: The game is just a exaggeration. In real life, Hao is a good husband and so is his wife. Hao and his wife are great couple. 

Pick the three correct shades of the lipstick, used up total 100 bucks.

Left Click - Pick      Space - Reset    R- Restart

Who's Hao?  My game partner and good friend

This is Hao

Instructor: Bennett Foddy
